alert.note: Alert for Miami (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 5:59PM EDT until July 02 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Miami County in west central Ohio... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 559 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Arcanum to near Lewisburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Troy, Piqua, Tipp City, West Milton, Covington, Bradford, Pleasant Hill, Union, Laura, Potsdam, Ludlow Falls, Ginghamsburg, Polo, Bloomer, Circle Hill and Garland. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 66 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
